title: Brown and Hernandez v Texas on discrimination

content.question: Respond to parts A, B, and C. Identify the clause in the Fourteenth Amendment that was used as the basis for the decision in both Brown v. Board of Education (1954) and Hernandez v. Texas (1954). Explain how the facts in both Brown v. Board of Education and Hernandez v. Texas led to a similar decision in both cases. Explain how an interest group could use the decision in Hernandez v. Texas to advance its agenda.
